name: RXBAR Chocolate Chip
description: Packed with protein and rich chocolate chips, this delicious bar may change your opinion on energy bars from "should eat" to "want to eat." RXBAR puts the primary ingredients of these bars front and centre, so you know what tasty thing you're about dig intoIngredients: dates, dried egg whites, almonds, cashews, chocolate, natural flavours and sea salt.Allergen: contains eggs, almonds and cashews.Manufactured in a facility that also processes peanuts, tree nuts, eggs, milk, soy and wheat.
